title: Cinnamon doughnuts with apple filling, maple glaze and vanilla créme Anglaise
description: Make doughnuts even more delicious with an apple filling, cinnamon sugar and a maple glaze, topped off with a silky créme Anglaise. Just make sure you don't eat them all by yourself.
ingredients: 350g/12oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
20g/¾oz fresh yeast or 10g/¼oz fast-action dried yeast
140ml/4½fl oz whole full-fat milk, slightly warmed
90g/3¼oz unsalted butter, cut into cubes, softened,
groundnut or vegetable oil, for deep-frying
½ vanilla pod, split in half lengthways and seeds scraped out
